Instrument_PDS3.instrument_desc:
Instrument Overview =================== The 'IHW INFRARED POLARIMETRY DATA' pseudo-instrument is used to identify polarimetric data obtained as part of the International Halley Watch (IHW) Infrared Studies Network (IRSN). Details of the specific instrument and filters used can be found in the individual data product labels.
In the IHW, observing systems were assigned codes for use in cross-referencing. The system codes appearing in the IRSN Polarimetry archive are:
Sub-Discipline: POLARIMETRY (IRPOL)
